ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَدْ حَكَمَ بَيْنَ الْعِبَادِ
en: Indeed, Allah has judged between the servants."

ar: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ فِى النَّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ
en: And those in the Fire will say to the keepers of Hell,
"Supplicate your Lord to lighten for us a day
a day from the punishment."

ar: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ فِى النَّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ
en: And those in the Fire will say to the keepers of Hell,
"Supplicate your Lord to lighten for us
a day from the punishment."
They will say,
"Did there not come to you your messengers
with clear proofs?"
They will say, "Yes."
They will reply, "Then supplicate [yourselves],
but the supplication of the disbelievers is not
except in error [i.e., futility]."
Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe
Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe
during the life of this world
and on the Day when the witnesses will stand -
The Day their excuse will not benefit the wrongdoers,
and they will have the curse,
and they will have the worst home [i.e., Hell].
